message.content: {"id": "17825", "title": "Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when using SWT.MULTI", "description": "When selecting SWT.MULTI option in ControlExampleText, a beep sound is heard. It seems that this behavior is not intended.", "OB": "The application should not emit any sound when choosing the SWT.MULTI option in ControlExampleText.", "EB": "Currently, there is a Windows 'ding' sound played when selecting SWT.MULTI, indicating an error. This sound should not be played.", "SR": "Investigate the cause of the beep sound when SWT.MULTI is selected in ControlExampleText. Update the code to eliminate this sound and ensure proper functioning of ControlExampleText with SWT.MULTI option."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
